testsuite.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 4 out of 4 - step workFlow tests

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 4 out of 4 - step workFlow tests S-WF-6393-004. User triggers a pipeline of one step that is configured to run on an empty node pool. The steplet logs include "Skipping step as no node is found."
testcase.classname: S-WF-6393-004. User triggers a pipeline of one step that is configured to run on an empty node pool. The steplet logs include "Skipping step as no node is found."

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 4 out of 4 - step workFlow tests S-WF-5859-003. User triggers a pipeline of two steps and the second step is configured to run on an empty node pool. The second step is skipped, the run status is skipped, and the step configPropertyBags do not include "skipRequested."
testcase.classname: S-WF-5859-003. User triggers a pipeline of two steps and the second step is configured to run on an empty node pool. The second step is skipped, the run status is skipped, and the step configPropertyBags do not include "skipRequested."

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 4 out of 4 - step workFlow tests S-WF-5859-004. User triggers a pipeline of one step that is configured to run on an empty node pool. The step is skipped, the run status is skipped, and the step configPropertyBag does not include "skipRequested."
testcase.classname: S-WF-5859-004. User triggers a pipeline of one step that is configured to run on an empty node pool. The step is skipped, the run status is skipped, and the step configPropertyBag does not include "skipRequested."

testsuite.name: Below test cases for skipped step steplet logs

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 4 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases for skipped step steplet logs S-WF-6393-001. User triggers a pipeline of three steps in series and the first step fails. The second and third steps are skipped and the steplet logs include "Skipping as step <input> has status <status>. Allowed statuses: [ 'success' ]."
testcase.classname: S-WF-6393-001. User triggers a pipeline of three steps in series and the first step fails. The second and third steps are skipped and the steplet logs include "Skipping as step <input> has status <status>. Allowed statuses: [ 'success' ]."

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 4 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases for skipped step steplet logs S-WF-6393-002. User triggers a pipeline of two steps connected by a resource with newVersionOnly on the step following the resource and it does not update the resource. The steplet logs include "Skipping step because input resource <resourceName> has not been updated."
testcase.classname: S-WF-6393-002. User triggers a pipeline of two steps connected by a resource with newVersionOnly on the step following the resource and it does not update the resource. The steplet logs include "Skipping step because input resource <resourceName> has not been updated."

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - 4 out of 4 - step workFlow tests Below test cases for skipped step steplet logs S-WF-6393-003. User triggers a pipeline of two steps connected by two resources with newVersionOnly on the step following the resource and it does not update either resource. The steplet logs include "Skipping step because input resources <resourceNames> have not been updated."
testcase.classname: S-WF-6393-003. User triggers a pipeline of two steps connected by two resources with newVersionOnly on the step following the resource and it does not update either resource. The steplet logs include "Skipping step because input resources <resourceNames> have not been updated."
